etymology.description: Depicts a simple representation of a shield
etymology.interpretation: The character 干(gān, "shield") originally represented a simple depiction of a shield used in ancient Chinese warfare. It visually resembles a shield with a handle in its structure.

examples.chinese: 战士举起干(戰士舉起干)。
在夜幕降临时他紧握干(在夜幕降臨時他緊握干)，抵抗敌人的侵袭(抵抗敵人的侵襲)。
examples.pinyin: Zài yèmù jiànglín shí tā jǐnwò gān, dǐkàng dírén de qīn xí.
examples.english: As night falls, he tightly grasps his shield to fend off the enemy's attack.
